channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Simpler regulations spearhead UK taskforce plan to get new nuclear reactors built
item.description: Panel’s final report outlines planning and environmental changes to get plants built faster and cheaper A government taskforce has finalised its plans...

item.title: Australia politics live: some MPs and staff warned to turn off phones when Chinese delegation visits Parliament House
item.description: Follow today’s news live Watch: Sussan Ley asks ‘how do we maintain the rage?’ over the 74 Australian women killed in 2024 Get our breaking news email...

item.title: More then 2,000 trafficked children and lone child asylum seekers missing from UK councils’ care
item.description: Charities say vulnerable young people are being failed by local authorities, the police and central government More than 2,000 children who have been ...

item.title: US hails 'tremendous progress' at Ukraine peace talks
item.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio says more work is needed to finalise a US-Ukraine deal that will then need Russia's agreement.

item.title: The Papers: Reeves eyes uni fees 'raid' and business Budget warning
item.description: With Budget week upon us, speculation about what could be in the chancellor's statement dominates the papers.

item.title: Cate Blanchett among BBC Radio 4 festive guest editors
item.description: The Christmas line-up also includes former PM Baroness Theresa May and inventor Sir James Dyson.

item.title: Catherine calls for end to 'stigma' around addiction
item.description: The message from the Princess of Wales comes on Addiction Awareness Week.

item.title: Has anyone seen Cole? A family's search for missing teenager
item.description: The family of Cole Cooper appealed to the public for help tracing the 19-year-old after he disappeared in May.

item.title: US woman behind Slender Man stabbing is missing after leaving group home
item.description: Morgan Geyser of Wisconsin cut off her electronic monitoring device and was last seen with an acquaintance A Wisconsin woman who admitted to stabbing ...

item.title: Snapchat to tell 440,000 Australians to prove they’re 16 or accounts will be locked in social media ban
item.description: In-app notifications go out this week to users believed to be aged under 16 ahead of 10 December social media ban Follow our Australia news live blog ...
